moves.1. d4: White Kingdom begins its march across the mountain, stopping to rest at about the halfway point between the two kingdoms.
moves.1... Nf6: The Kingside Reconnaissance Team moves out of the castle area to get a closer look at reports of a White Kingdom squadron moving closer to the Black Kingdom.
moves.2. c4: While the squadron originating from d2 rests, Daxter sends c2 to accompany them.
moves.2... g6: Antony deploys a squadron next to the reconnaissance team as a precaution, since the Whites' intentions are still uncertain.
moves.3. c5: The squadron of c2 moves ahead of d2, disobeying orders to wait for them.
moves.3... Nd5: The reconnaissance team moves fairly close to the two White Squadrons, but any attempt at communication is ignored.
moves.4. c6: The squadron of c2 moves up, ignoring the ordeal of those from d2 being blocked by the reconnaissance team.
moves.4... Nxc6:
The Black Survey Corps are the first to spot the squadron, and assume the worst.

The squadron of c2 is destroyed and the Survey Corps get information from the reconnaissance team.
moves.21. Nh3 a4 22. Rc1 Bb6 23. Qxb5: bishop wants to go kill the queen even if it costs his life, but antony won't allow him
moves.23... Bg4 24. f4 Qd4 25. Rxc7 Qd8 26. Nc: Careless move, but the white queen was bloodthirsty from killing all those pawns
moves.29... Kxf7: The king is forced to murer the white queen with his bare hands and nothing else
moves.30. Bc4+ Be6: bishop defends king with his life
moves.31. Bxe6+ Ke8: King cannot muster the strength to destroy the bishop, so he retreats
The white king is locked up in the kingdom
